verbs.description: " It [V: 's] [ARG2: President Trump] [ARG1: who should receive the Nobel Prize] . We only need to take peace . "
" It 's President Trump who [V: should] receive the Nobel Prize . We only need to take peace . "
" It 's [ARG0: President Trump] [R-ARG0: who] [ARGM-MOD: should] [V: receive] [ARG1: the Nobel Prize] . We only need to take peace . "
" It 's President Trump who should receive the Nobel Prize . [ARG0: We] [ARGM-ADV: only] [V: need] [ARG1: to take peace] . "
" It 's President Trump who should receive the Nobel Prize . [ARG0: We] only need to [V: take] [ARG1: peace] . "
